name: Witch Spell
description:
Do you believe in magic?

What about true love?

Too fairy-tale-ish?

Well, once upon a time...

Akari is happy! Her friend Hisato has just taught her the ultimate supersonic hypersonic raspberry love spell! As she tries to charm her crush Jin with magic rituals, she encounters a series of unfortunate events. Can she still find her "happy ever after"?

Find out in the sugary sweet and super silly visual novel, Witch Spell!

  • Two different endings
  • Features English voices by Helene Daviau (HuniePop), Christopher Escalante (Seduce Me!), and Zach Aguilar (Kill La Kill, Sword Art Online).
  • Text available in English, German and Dutch.
